title: parking floor level /podium , additional sanitary block for every 200 cars or part there of shall be allowed
clause_text: parking floor level /podium , additional sanitary block for every 200 cars or part there of shall be allowed. Letter boxes as specified in Regulation No 37(10) (b) Area of DG set at stilt and podium level as specified in Regulation No 37(31)
